Description_lang: Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal $s2% additional damage and extend the duration of $?s384092[Crusade]?s394088[Avenging Crusader]?s385438[Sentinel][Avenging Wrath] by ${$s1/1000}.1 sec.

description_blz.en_US: Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal 10% additional damage and extend the duration of Avenging Wrath by 0.5 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Martillo de cólera y Sentencia infligen un 10% más de daño y extienden la duración de Cólera vengativa 0.5 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Martelo da Ira e Julgamento causam 10% a mais de dano e prolongam a duração da habilidade Ira Vingativa em 0,5 s.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Hammer des Zorns' und 'Richturteil' verursachen 10% mehr Schaden und verlängern die Dauer von 'Zornige Vergeltung' um 0,5 Sek.
description_blz.en_GB: Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal 10% additional damage and extend the duration of Avenging Wrath by 0.5 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Martillo de cólera y Sentencia infligen un 10% más de daño y prolongan 0,5 s la duración de Cólera vengativa.
description_blz.fr_FR: Marteau de courroux et Jugement infligent 10% de dégâts supplémentaires et augmentent la durée de Courroux vengeur de 0,5 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Martello dell'Ira e Giudizio del 10% ed estende la durata di Ira Vendicatrice di 0,5 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Молот гнева" наносит на 10% больше урона и продлевает действие "Гнева карателя" на 0,5 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 천벌의 망치와 심판의 공격력이 10%만큼 증가하고 응징의 격노의 지속시간이 0.5초만큼 연장됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 憤怒之錘和審判額外造成10%傷害，並使復仇之怒的持續時間延長0.5秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 愤怒之锤和审判造成的伤害提高10%，并会使复仇之怒的持续时间延长0.5秒。
